sampleBuysFromLiquidityProviderRegistry(.details: Sample buy quotes from an arbitrary on-chain liquidity provider.

params.makerToken: Address of the maker token (what to buy).
params.makerTokenAmounts: Maker token buy amount for each sample.
params.registryAddress: Address of the liquidity provider registry contract.
params.takerToken: Address of the taker token (what to sell).

sampleBuysFromLiquidityProviderRegistry(.return: takerTokenAmounts Taker amounts sold at each maker token         amount.
